Criteria: Customers using special protocols that WAAP can’t protect
Search Query: site:{website} ("custom protocol" OR "integration")
Signals: Mentions of unsupported/custom protocols (e.g., proprietary APIs, non-HTTP protocols)

Criteria: Offers client-facing SaaS platforms or infrastructure portals (e.g., dashboards, control panels)
Search Query: site:{website} ("SaaS platform" OR "client-facing app")
Signals: Use ipinfo.io, bgp.he.net; mentions of “our network”, “data centers”, “edge”, or ASN info

Criteria: The Company has its own SOC
Search Query: (("Security Operations Center" OR "Security Operations Centre" OR "SOC team" OR "Cyber Defense Center") (site:{website} OR site:careers.{root_domain} OR site:jobs.{root_domain} OR site:linkedin.com/company/{company}))
Signals: Job titles (SOC Analyst, SOC Manager), page headings (SOC, Security Operations Centre), “24/7 monitoring”

Criteria: Company operates in financial services
Search Query: site:{website} ("financial services" OR fintech OR payments OR brokerage)
Signals: Mention of banking, finance, fintech, or similar domain

Signals: Job titles (SOC Analyst, SOC Manager), page headings (SOC, Security Operations Centre), “24/7 monitoring”

Criteria: Oauth support, MFA, ZTNA, File Scanning (ICAP), SIEM plugins - BI platforms - Issue management systems
Place: Documentation, careers, product pages, blog posts
Search Query: site:{website} ("OAuth" OR "OIDC" OR "SAML" OR "MFA" OR "Zero Trust" OR "ZTNA" OR "ICAP" OR "SIEM plugin")
Signals: Mentions of integrations (e.g., Okta, Azure AD, Splunk, Tableau, Jira), security feature specs

Criteria: The company is under downsizing/cost reduction process
Place: News articles, blog posts, press releases, security incident databases
Search Query: site:{website} (layoffs OR restructuring OR "cost-cutting" OR "headcount reduction" OR "organizational change" OR "efficiency initiative")
Signals: Layoff announcements, hiring freezes, CFO statements on budget cuts

Criteria: Age verification - Age gates (“I am over 18”), “Verify age” popups, adult disclaimers
Search Query: site:{website} ("over 18" OR "must be 18" OR "adult-only" OR "age-gate" OR "age-verification" OR "verify age")
Signals: JS variables (ageGate, AgeVerify), overlay text (“enter DOB”, “verify age”)

Criteria: Offers adult services
Search Query: site:{website} ("adult entertainment" OR porn OR webcam OR NSFW OR "escort service" OR "adult dating" OR "18+ videos" OR XXX)
Signals: Dating Website keywords - “Meet singles”, “find love”, “dating app”, “matchmaking”, “swipe”, “chat with singles”

Search Query: (("Security Operations Center" OR "Security Operations Centre" OR "SOC team" OR "Cyber Defense Center") (site:{website} OR site:careers.{root_domain} OR site:jobs.{root_domain} OR site:linkedin.com/company/{company}))

Criteria: The company sells products or services online
Search Query: site:{website} ("shop" OR "store" OR "products" OR "ecommerce")
Signals: Product listings, pricing tables, product detail pages, catalog views

Criteria: The website includes shopping cart functionality or a “Buy Now”/“Add to Cart” system
Search Query: site:{website} ("add to cart" OR "buy now" OR "basket" OR "checkout" OR "cart.js" OR "woocommerce_cart")
Signals: HTML buttons (btn-add-to-cart), SVG cart icon, “basket total”

Criteria: Has login system
Search Query: site:{website} (inurl:login OR inurl:signin OR "sign in" OR "/account") OR site:auth.{root_domain} OR site:account.{root_domain}
Signals: Sign-in/login forms, account access options, user session detection, URLs like /login, /signin

Criteria: Security compliance
Search Query: site:{website} OR site:trust.{root_domain} ("ISO 27" OR "SOC 2" OR "PCI DSS" OR "HIPAA" OR "GDPR")
Signals: Mentions of standards in privacy or compliance pages, trust badges, secure processing statements

Criteria: B2C focus
Search Query: site:{website} ("customers" OR "consumers" OR "for individuals" OR "delivered to your door")
Signals: Marketing language targeting individuals, product reviews, customer testimonials, FAQs aimed at personal buyers
